name: Center for Creative Training Association
memberOrga: This is voluntary membership. Members of the organisation do not receive money for their membership.
goal: CCTA is a non-profit and non-governmental organisation, advocating practical approach to general education and trainings, effectively mastering key competencies and helping learners enhance their potential for successful professional and social life. Among the CCTA’s core activities are trainings for in-service teachers, analysis and consultancy on ICT deployment to schools and kindergartens. CCTA is also advising school management and teachers on the ways to implement cloud based services in educational process and in administration. Тhe CCTA facilitates the collaboration among teachers through development and dissemination of open educational resources. The organisation maintains productive contacts with more than 700 primary and secondary schools across Bulgaria.
interests: Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: CCTA’s focuses on lifelong learning and youth initiatives. The Association is in cooperation with the Bulgarian Ministry Education and its Regional Departments of Education to support achievement of ET2020 goals in Bulgaria.
